author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Indian Academy of Paediatrics has launched ACE 10/10, a healthcare initiative aimed at adolescents, a press release said. The initiative will focus on driving awareness around three key pillars of health, nutrition and vaccinations essential to comprehensive adolescent care.

Under the program,me paediatricians will be trained on providing standard care for adolescents across the three pillars.

The ACE 10/10 program will be rolled out starting March, the release said.
title: Healthcare initiative for teens
